title: Test Issue:  at-spi2-core
body:
Running
```
spack install --test=all at-spi2-core

```

results in
```

==> Installing at-spi2-core-2.38.0-rtrvsmx73ciqrxgzzi5ozu3to44ocny6
==> Warning: Spack will not check SSL certificates. You need to update your Python to enable certificate verification.
==> No binary for at-spi2-core-2.38.0-rtrvsmx73ciqrxgzzi5ozu3to44ocny6 found: installing from source
==> Warning: Suspicious requests to set or unset 'PYTHONHOME' found  
==> Warning:             at /home/gitlab-runner/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/python/package.py:845
==> Warning:    --->    unknown context at unknown file:unknown line 
==> Fetching https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/_source-cache/archive/84/84e36c3fe66862133f5fe229772b76aa2526e10de5014a3778f2fa46ce550da5.tar.xz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> No patches needed for at-spi2-core
==> at-spi2-core: Executing phase: 'meson'
==> at-spi2-core: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    'ninja' '-j4' 'test'

1 error found in build log:
     225    Fail:               2
     226    Unexpected Pass:    0
     227    Skipped:            0
     228    Timeout:            0
     229
     230    Full log written to /tmp/gitlab-runner/spack-stage/spack-stage-at-s
            pi2-core-2.38.0-rtrvsmx73ciqrxgzzi5ozu3to44ocny6/spack-src/spack-bu
            ild/meson-logs/testlog.txt
  >> 231    FAILED: meson-test
     232    /cvmfs/sw.hsf.org/spackages/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-8.3.0/meson-0.
            57.1-tijqgwd57jhvabowrra4raiz527e2gs2/bin/meson test --no-rebuild -
            -print-errorlogs
     233    ninja: build stopped: subcommand failed.

See build log for details:
  /tmp/gitlab-runner/spack-stage/spack-stage-at-spi2-core-2.38.0-rtrvsmx73ciqrxgzzi5ozu3to44ocny6/spack-build-out.txt


```
